description: Welcome to Bristol Heights a master planned community by Polygon !! This main level entry bright 3 bed 2.5 bath home, Which boasts an open concept layout by 9' ceilings on the main floor, laminate wood-style flooring, and a spacious deck off the kitchen. View From the Balcony Off the Gourmet chef's Kitchen, engineered stone counter-tops with tile backsplash. Upstairs 3 bedrooms and 2 full baths & enjoy the convenience of top-floor laundry and the luxury of a master ensuite with double sinks and a spa shower with a built-in bench. Downstairs, Tandem Garage for 2 Cars and storage shelving .Next to cul-de-sac with lots of visitor parking and city public park is coming soon! The amenities: pool, hot-tub, gym, and much more at resort-inspired clubhouse. Rental is allowed.
